Question: Should patients with MTX-naïve and non-MTX csDMARDs exposed RA and moderate to high disease activity, receive long-term (≥ 3 months) low dose (≤ 10mg per day) GCs and mono- or combination csDMARDs or mono or combination csDMARDs alone?

Explanations.a: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence interval includes both values suggesting no effect and values suggesting harm. Small sample size.
Explanations.b: csDMARD includes SSZ with long-term (>=3 months) prednisone (7mg/day).

References.1: Capell HA, Madhok R, Hunter JA, Porter D, Morrison E, Larkin J, et al. Lack of radiological and clinical benefit over two years of low dose prednisolone for rheumatoid arthritis: results of a randomised controlled trial. Annals of the Rheumatic Diseases. 2004;63(7):797.
